original_text:
Just Jewels
Caratteristiche generali
Software: Novomatic
Rulli: 5
Linee di vincita: 9
Puntata minima: 0.01 €
Puntata massima: 9 €
Payout: 95,5%
Just Jewels in sintesi
Con Just Jewels, dell’austriaca Novomatic, entriamo a pieno titolo nell’ambito delle slot machine old school che si ispirano alle prime slot da casinò o da bar.
Il tema, le gemme, è veramente un classico nelle VLT slot, e Just Jewels cerca di riprodurre sia graficamente con dei veri e propri pulsanti integrati, sia con gli effetti sonori, la sensazione di trovarsi davanti a una slot terrestre.
Lo sfondo è blu scuro e le gemme di diversa foggia scintillano sui rulli, dando la sensazione di avere davanti uno scrigno colmo di tesori.
Il gameplay è estremamente semplice, mancano infatti del tutto le funzioni speciali, tuttavia un ritorno superiore al 95% e delle vincite di tutto rispetto, rendono il gioco piacevole e divertente.
Le puntate vanno da 0,01 € a 9 €, un range non particolarmente ampio, e per questo Just Jewels è un gioco adattissimo sia ai giocatori “prudenti” che ai principianti, che non amano rischiare cifre troppo alte prima di aver preso confidenza con il gioco.
Simboli e loro valore
I simboli in Just Jewels sono un’ode alla ricchezza in tutte le sue forme: accanto alle gemme troviamo infatti a dei mazzi di banconote e il logo dell’euro, ma anche lingotti d’oro e sfavillanti tiare incastonate con pietre preziose!
Il valore dei simboli è ovviamente variabile: per quanto riguarda le pietre, abbiamo smeraldi e ametiste che valgono fino a 15.000 gettoni, mentre rubini e zaffiri pagano fino a 20.000 gettoni.
Il logo dell’euro permette di vincere anche 45.000 gettoni, ma un bel mazzo di banconote arriva fino a 50.000 e lo stesso vale per il lingotto d’oro.
Crescendo con i premi, arriviamo alle ricchissime corone tempestate di pietre preziose, che, rappresentando il simbolo che paga di più in assoluto in questo gioco, possono far vincere il premio stellare di 500.000 gettoni!
In Just Jewels manca del tutto il simbolo Wild, non è dunque prevista nessuna figura che possa sostituire le altre per il completamento di una combinazione vincente. È presente invece il simbolo Scatter, che premia anche quando compare sui rulli in posizioni non adiacenti, a differenza degli altri simboli, che devono essere allineati sempre da sinistra verso destra.
Sistema di puntate
Il valore di ogni puntata su Just Jewels viene espresso in termini di “crediti” che valgono 0,01 € ciascuno. Su ogni linea di pagamento è possibile puntare fino a 100 crediti, per un totale di 1€: questo significa che puntando il massimo su ognuna delle nove linee di pagamento, l’importo sarà di soli 9 €.
È possibile poi scegliere su quante linee di pagamento puntare, partendo da 1, poi 3, 5, 7, o 9. Il valore così modesto della scommessa massima non vi deve però far pensare che si tratti di una slot a cui non vale la pensa giocare se si ama rischiare cifre consistenti: per i giocatori più intrepidi infatti, come da tradizione in casa Novomatic, c’è sempre la possibilità di raddoppiare le vincite di qualsiasi importo tramite la funzione Gamble!
Infine, è presente l’Autoplay, che consente di impostare il numero di giri e il valore della puntata, e lasciar girare i rulli in automatico, fino a quando la funzione non viene disattivata manualmente!

raw_translation.response:
Just Jewels

Key Features
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5
Paylines: 9
Minimum bet: €0.01
Maximum bet: €9
Payout: 95.5%

Just Jewels in a nutshell
Just Jewels, by Austrian gaming powerhouse Novomatic, is a classic old-school slot machine that takes inspiration from the earliest casino and bar slots. The theme - gemstones - is a classic VLT slot subject, and Just Jewels seeks to replicate the feel of playing a physical, land-based slot with integrated buttons and authentic sound effects. The dark blue background and variously-shaped gems shimmering on the reels give the player a sense of having found their way to a treasure trove. With no special features to speak of, the gameplay is extremely straightforward, yet the game remains enjoyable and entertaining thanks to a return rate of over 95%. With a betting range of €0.01 to €9, Just Jewels is well suited to cautious or beginner players who prefer not to take high risks before getting a feel for the game.

Symbols and their values
Symbols in Just Jewels are all about celebrating riches in all their forms: alongside the gems, there are banknote bundles and the Euro logo, as well as gold bullion and sparkling tiaras studded with precious stones! Clearly, the values of these symbols vary: for example, emeralds and amethysts are each worth up to 15,000 coins, while rubies and sapphires pay up to 20,000 coins. The Euro logo symbol can pay up to 45,000 coins, though bundles of banknotes can go as high as 50,000 and the same goes for gold bullion. The game's most valuable symbols are the stunning, jewel-encrusted crowns, which can result in a staggering jackpot of 500,000 coins! There are no Wild symbols in Just Jewels. However, there is a Scatter symbol, which pays out even when not appearing in adjacent reels, unlike the other symbols, which must be aligned from left to right.

Betting system
Every bet in Just Jewels is measured in "credits," each one worth €0.01. Players can bet up to 100 credits on each payline, for a total of €1. This means that betting the maximum amount on all nine paylines results in a mere €9 wager. However, the modest cost of the maximum bet should not deter risk-takers from enjoying this slot, as there is always the Novomatic tradition of doubling winnings of any value with the Gamble feature! Finally, the Autoplay function allows players to set the number of spins and the value of the bet, to keep the reels spinning automatically until the function is manually deactivated.

raw_translation.response:
Just Jewels

General features:
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5
Paylines: 9
Minimum bet: 0.01€
Maximum bet: 9€
Payout: 95.5%

Summary of Just Jewels:
With Just Jewels by Austrian game developer Novomatic, we are fully immersed in the world of old school slot machines inspired by the early casino and bar slots. The gemstone theme is a classic in slot machines, and Just Jewels replicates this both visually, with actual integrated buttons, and with sound effects, to recreate the feeling of being in front of a land-based game. The dark blue background and various sparkling gemstones on the reels give you the sensation of having a treasure chest in front of you. 

The gameplay is extremely simple, lacking any special features, but with a return of over 95% and decent wins, the game is still enjoyable and entertaining. The betting range is not particularly wide, with bets ranging from 0.01€ to 9€, making Just Jewels a perfect fit for cautious players and beginners who prefer not to risk too much before getting familiar with the game. 

Symbols and their value:
The symbols in Just Jewels represent wealth in all its forms, including gemstones, rolls of banknotes, the euro logo, gold bars, and dazzling tiaras set with precious stones. The value of the symbols, of course, varies. As for the gemstones, emeralds and amethysts are worth up to 15,000 tokens, while rubies and sapphires pay up to 20,000 tokens. The euro logo allows you to win up to 45,000 tokens, but a nice roll of banknotes can get you up to 50,000, as can a gold bar. 

The ultimate prize, however, goes to the incredibly expensive crowns encrusted with precious gems. Representing the highest paying symbol in the game, these can win you the jackpot of 500,000 tokens!

Wild symbols are absent from Just Jewels, so there is no symbol that can substitute for others to complete a winning combination. The game does have Scatter symbols, however, which offer rewards even when they appear on the reels in non-adjacent positions, unlike the other symbols, which must always be aligned from left to right. 

Betting system:
The value of every bet in Just Jewels is expressed in terms of "credits," each of which is worth 0.01€. You can bet up to 100 credits on each payline, for a total of 1€. This means that if you bet the maximum on all nine paylines, your total bet will only be 9€. 

You can also choose how many paylines to activate, starting from 1, then 3, 5, 7, or 9. Don't let the low maximum bet value fool you into thinking that this is a slot not worth playing if you enjoy taking big risks. For more daring players, as is the tradition with Novomatic games, the Gamble feature allows you to double your winnings, regardless of the amount. 

Finally, there's the Autoplay feature, which allows you to set the number of spins and the value of your bet, and automatically spins the reels until the function is manually turned off. 

Overall, Just Jewels is a visually appealing and enjoyable game for all types of players, from beginners to experienced gamblers.

Review: Just Jewels

General features:
Software: Novomatic
Reels: 5
Paylines: 9
Minimum bet: 0.01€
Maximum bet: 9€
Payout: 95.5%

Summary of Just Jewels:
With Just Jewels by Austrian game developer Novomatic, we are fully immersed in the world of old school slot machines inspired by the early casino and bar slots. The gemstone theme is a classic in slot machines, and Just Jewels replicates this both visually, with actual integrated buttons, and with sound effects, to recreate the feeling of being in front of a land-based game. The dark blue background and various sparkling gemstones on the reels give you the sensation of having a treasure chest in front of you. 

The gameplay is extremely simple, lacking any special features, but with a return of over 95% and decent wins, the game is still enjoyable and entertaining. The betting range is not particularly wide, with bets ranging from 0.01€ to 9€, making Just Jewels a perfect fit for cautious players and beginners who prefer not to risk too much before getting familiar with the game. 

Symbols and their value:
The symbols in Just Jewels represent wealth in all its forms, including gemstones, rolls of banknotes, the euro logo, gold bars, and dazzling tiaras set with precious stones. The value of the symbols, of course, varies. As for the gemstones, emeralds and amethysts are worth up to 15,000 tokens, while rubies and sapphires pay up to 20,000 tokens. The euro logo allows you to win up to 45,000 tokens, but a nice roll of banknotes can get you up to 50,000, as can a gold bar. 

The ultimate prize, however, goes to the incredibly expensive crowns encrusted with precious gems. Representing the highest paying symbol in the game, these can win you the jackpot of 500,000 tokens!

Wild symbols are absent from Just Jewels, so there is no symbol that can substitute for others to complete a winning combination. The game does have Scatter symbols, however, which offer rewards even when they appear on the reels in non-adjacent positions, unlike the other symbols, which must always be aligned from left to right. 

Betting system:
The value of every bet in Just Jewels is expressed in terms of "credits," each of which is worth 0.01€. You can bet up to 100 credits on each payline, for a total of 1€. This means that if you bet the maximum on all nine paylines, your total bet will only be 9€. 

You can also choose how many paylines to activate, starting from 1, then 3, 5, 7, or 9. Don't let the low maximum bet value fool you into thinking that this is a slot not worth playing if you enjoy taking big risks. For more daring players, as is the tradition with Novomatic games, the Gamble feature allows you to double your winnings, regardless of the amount. 

Finally, there's the Autoplay feature, which allows you to set the number of spins and the value of your bet, and automatically spins the reels until the function is manually turned off. 

Overall, Just Jewels is a visually appealing and enjoyable game for all types of players, from beginners to experienced gamblers.
